english.segment1: Oh star fall down on me. Let me make a wish upon you. Hold on, let me think. Think of what I'm wishing for
english.segment2: Wait, don't go away. Just not yet. Cause I thought, I had it. But I forget.
english.segment3: And I won't let you fall away, From me. You will never fade. And I won't let you fall away. From me. You will never fade away from me.
english.segment4: And now I let my dreams consume me, And tell me what to think. But hold on, Hold on. What am I dreaming?
english.segment5: Wait, don't go away. Just not yet. Cause I thought, That I had it. But I forget.
english.segment6: And I won't let you fall away, From me. You will never fade away. I won't let you fall away. You will never fade away.
english.segment7: And I won't let you fall away. You will never fade away. And I won't let you fall away from me, You will never fade..
english.segment8: Oh star fall down on me.
